name: scribe-css-build
description: Build tools for Scribe ESP32-C3 Thermal Printer CSS

scripts.build: npm run build-css & npm run build-js-prod & wait
scripts.build-js: npm run build-js-vendor & npm run build-js-pages & wait
scripts.build-js-prod: npm run build-js-vendor & npm run build-js-pages-prod & wait
scripts.build-js-vendor: cp node_modules/alpinejs/dist/cdn.min.js data/js/vendor-temp.js && cat node_modules/@simonwep/pickr/dist/pickr.min.js >> data/js/vendor-temp.js && npx terser src/js/config.js src/js/shared.js -c -m >> data/js/vendor-temp.js && cp data/js/vendor-temp.js data/js/vendor.min.js && rm data/js/vendor-temp.js
scripts.build-js-pages: npx terser src/js/config.js src/js/index-alpine-store.js src/js/index-api.js --output data/js/page-index.min.js & npx terser src/js/settings-alpine-store.js src/js/settings-api.js --output data/js/page-settings.min.js & npx terser src/js/diagnostics-alpine-store.js src/js/diagnostics-api.js --output data/js/page-diagnostics.min.js & npx terser src/js/404-alpine-store.js --output data/js/page-404.min.js & wait
scripts.build-js-pages-prod: npx terser src/js/config.js src/js/index-alpine-store.js src/js/index-api.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/page-index.min.js & npx terser src/js/settings-alpine-store.js src/js/settings-api.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/page-settings.min.js & npx terser src/js/diagnostics-alpine-store.js src/js/diagnostics-api.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/page-diagnostics.min.js & npx terser src/js/404-alpine-store.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/page-404.min.js & wait
scripts.build-js-index: npx terser src/js/config.js src/js/index-alpine-store.js src/js/index-api.js --output data/js/page-index.min.js
scripts.build-js-index-prod: npx terser src/js/config.js src/js/index-alpine-store.js src/js/index-api.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/page-index.min.js
scripts.watch-js: npm run build-js-pages && npm run watch-js-index & npm run watch-js-settings & npm run watch-js-diagnostics & npm run watch-js-404
scripts.watch-js-index: npx terser src/js/config.js src/js/index-alpine-store.js src/js/index-api.js --output data/js/page-index.min.js --watch
scripts.watch: npm run watch-css & npm run watch-js
